reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress beautiful and comfortable, with a perfect fit and true sizing. The material quality receives mixed feedback - while some find it nice and thick, others describe it as cheap and thin. Moreover, the color accuracy is mixed, with some praising the amazing color while others note it's not the rose gold shade they expected. Additionally, the feathers fall off easily, and the straps are problematic, with reports of them being sewed on backwards and not crossing properly in the back. The quality is also mixed, with some praising the top while others find it poorly made. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this dress for my 60th photo shoot..
items.body: I'm just going to be totally honest I added sum more additional feathers to my dress. I just wanted a little extra.. I did not wear this dress to a party or a outing I only wore it for the photo shoot I posted my photos online I received so many great compliments the dress fits really nice. It was really true to size The fabric was pretty good It did have enough give in it for comfort the back straps was so cute. This is a yes for me.. I ordered a size L I am 5'7 and 190 lb and curvy ðŸ’‹ Read more
items.author: Annette Brown

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not the same dress, itâ€™s a catfish! Do not buy
items.body: They really catfished me with this dress. The dress is completely different than the one shown. The straps are different lengths. The feathers are a completely different color than shown. The fabric is super cheap. The stitching is terrible and the fit of the dress is completely off and not accurate. Also the feathers are super sparse. It looks like a half plucked chicken that escaped the coop. Thereâ€™s no stretch at all, but thatâ€™s not an issue seeing as it was sized wrong and as a result is too big. Also it was very uncomfortable. The sellers should be ashamed Read more
items.author: E

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice dress
items.body: Actually nice dress, easy to wear, feathers are a little loose but I think I will fix that myself with some extra hot glue. Dress has a little stretch to it so itâ€™s pretty comfortable. Great for a mystery or mob party. Read more
items.author: erika longwell

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful, fit great but a little delicate
items.body: Great fit , only issue is the feathers are very delicate so handle gently. Very nice dress though for a Gatsby event Read more
items.author: Melaine Isaacs Wright

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars CUTE BUT FEATHER NOT ATTACHED
items.body: FEATHER WERE FALLING OFF BEFORE I GOT A CHANCE TO WEAR IT. RETURNED IT Read more
items.author: Quita

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for the Occasion
items.body: Perfect for my kids homecoming dance. The colors are beautiful and the fit was good too. For the price, just perfect . Read more
items.author: Davia Shannon

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute dress
items.body: I took my birthday pictures in this dress and I loved it but fair warning the feathers do come off and shed alot. Read more
items.author: Lillian

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars The feathers are white!!!
items.body: This picture is very misleading! The feathers are WHITE!!! Not the rose gold color that is depicted in the picture!!! The overall fit is good and itâ€™s comfortable, a little hard to get on, and yesss you will lose a lot of feathers! Read more
items.author: Re Re

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Formal Evening Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Formal Evening Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Rose Red, Silver Red, Beige, Blue, Purple, Black, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
